```{r}
library(data.table)
dt <- fread("input.txt")
head(dt)
```

## Part 1

```{r}
sum(dt$V1)
```

## Part 2

```{r}
breakFlag <- FALSE
re_pete <- 1
while (!breakFlag) {
  vec <- cumsum(rep(dt$V1, re_pete))
  
  twice <- vec[duplicated(vec)]
  
  if (length(twice >= 1)) {
    print(twice[1])
    breakFlag <- TRUE
  } else {
    re_pete <- re_pete + 1
  }
}
```
